description:
“I’ve always wanted to do this sort of thing.”
Grant was pretty excited to be here, but at the same time he had a nervousness that was truly adorable.
He’s a short guy, nicely muscled with big pecs.
“I used to do gymnastics!” he told us. “Everyone who does it is in great shape.”
“Do you still do it?”
“I had to back off a bit... it consumes your life,” he said. “I was spending over fifty hours a week at the gym. It was a little ridiculous.”
“Do you still have any of the skills?”
“Of course!” Without missing a beat, Grant started doing flips. I think I was most impressed when he did a full-on split.
“Does that ever get you laid?”
“You would be surprised!”
Grant had just recently started fooling around with guys and just talking about it turned him on.
“What’s the most you’ve done with a guy so far?”
“I got fucked last week for the first time.”
“And?”
“It was insane. I came without even touching myself!”
title: Grant
